Summary:
The CL team is working on implementing the Bellatrix upgrade. The mainnet merge timeline has been updated and it's now expected that the merge will happen in mid-September.

The EL team discussed the status of their work on the execution layer, including the implementation of EIP-4844 (Proto-Danksharding). They are making good progress but still have some issues to resolve before they can complete the upgrade. 

There is a need for more testing and validation of the merge process in devnet.

The CL team will continue working on implementing Bellatrix and the EL team will focus on completing EIP-4844 implementation.
